## IOptions.concurrency property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Since 1.0.1, benefits of concurreny ultimately limited due to single-threaded runtime and increases risk of issues within Browserify (not intended for parallel usage).
> 

Maximum number of concurrent browserify bundling operations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
concurrency?: number;
```
